column1: Hello,Travelling to a resort in Mayan Riviera this weekend for a week. Based on what I'm reading we should be okay. Has anyone been as recently as this week to provide some feedback or how their experience was flying out of Pearson and flying into Cancun airport would be appreciated.Thanks
What exactly are you asking about? Are you referring to the COVID-19 virus?If so, there are numerous threads on this already.
